attributes.action: Scrap the new logo for the London 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new logo for the London 2012 Olympics is hugely unpopular with the population and does not fit in properly with the rest of the Olympics.

The £400k was money wasted and the logo should be scrapped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
